name: Mittelborg
description:
You are a chancellor of Mittelborg, a crucial city for the balance of all existing powers in-between worlds. There is the Ancient Order of Magicians in the city, called Viates, They have been protecting the numerous connected worlds and watching for World Tree since the beginning of time.
World Tree is a mirror of equilibrium of all powers in world. It is woven of the invisible divine fibers. When it flourishes, it exudes power. It gives all Viates magic and energy to prevent the chaos in the Universe. But World Tree soon die forever… As the last chancellor disappeared during one magical campaign, World Tree keeps fading away. The mighty of Viates oozes with the vitality of World Tree too. It leads to the massive imbalance of the sacred source of powers and outbreaks of mysterious mortal storms. Tempests roar across worlds, bringing damage and destruction, spreading fear in hearts, knowing no mercy, erasing everything on their way.
This turn-based game requires your attention all the time. The result will differ from a previous playthrough. The same decision in the same event yields a different result; travels to various worlds may end up differently. Who knows what kind of a new potion or an artefact you will craft this playthrough. Replaying is worthwhile because of diverse arsenal of magical spells or artefacts one can crowd.
Your magical power is in reincarnation after death with all memories and skills saved. Use your advantage and start over again. Develop your strategy. Try different tactics and find one matching your style, train your logic in quests. Have a think how to gather the most powerful arsenal of spells or how to resque city from roaring mystical storms. Ahead there are campaigns to numerous magical worlds, miraculous adventures. The struggle is a beginning, embrace it and survive!
